Is anyone else completely thrown by the fact that Cardassian and Kardashian sound so similar?

'Tis the season when once more I discover through writing Christmas cards that my handwriting has deteriorated yet further.

Had my first Christmas mince pie of the season today! Also my second. Planning on a third.
@erikapearson I will report back tomorrow arvo :-)
@erikapearson Well, the people have spoken. So be it.
The more I learn about #copyright law, the more I'm like COME ON NOW, THIS IS GETTING SILLY
I'm off to the hairdresser again on Friday; which colour should I dye my hair this time?
@andicbuchanan @merylstenhouse They were all really good except the final one
@merylstenhouse @andicbuchanan At Moore Wilsons you are limited only by your bank balance. It's a magical place!
@merylstenhouse Yup. It was really intense. We had a cheese hangover the next day. (Also from all the wine matches tho'.)
@merylstenhouse @andicbuchanan I also recommend a trip to the Moore Wilsons walk-in cheese fridge
@merylstenhouse @andicbuchanan You'll have to wait til the next NZ Cheese Month, October 2017, & then come to the Wairarapa
@andicbuchanan which I disliked so much I actually couldn't eat it - a first for any choc dish
@andicbuchanan I have to say they did fall over in the final course, which was not a cheesecake but instead a blue cheese choc souffle
@andicbuchanan @merylstenhouse For NZ Cheese Month we went to Featherston cheese shop & had a 7-course cheese feast. It was...an experience
@andicbuchanan I am significantly in favour of cheese pie. Why not add a sprig of mistletoe for that festive touch?
@andicbuchanan Cheese on crackers, cheese toasties, cheese surprise, or any of the above while wearing tinsel & drinking mulled wine

@erikapearson That is Will Pufflington. He wasn't very impressed to be interrupted from his nap just for a photo op.
Twitter is really, really insistent that I follow Katy Perry.
@nzfi @PipAdam I did for a long time but I've trained myself out of it now - and as an editor I spend a lot of time removing double spaces
@mariehodgkinson @PipAdam Oh no, you missed the window! My mum was streamed out of typing at school & had to take Latin instead
